description: Enjoy a 2-hour kayaking session on the Aasee with friends. Paddle around the lake and enjoy the sun, perfect for a hot summer day.

locationInfo.description: Aasee is a beautiful lake in Münster, and kayaking here is a fantastic way to stay cool while enjoying the surroundings.
safetyTips: Wear a life jacket for safety.
Stay hydrated and protect yourself from the sun with sunscreen.

description: Take a 2.5-hour cycling tour along Münster’s famous Promenade, which is lined with trees and offers a scenic route around the city.

locationInfo.description: The Promenade is a stunning route around Münster’s city center. Cycling here gives you a great view of the city while staying active in the heat.
safetyTips: Wear a helmet and comfortable clothes.
Bring water and take breaks in shaded spots to stay cool.

description: Spend a relaxing 2-hour picnic with friends at Schlossgarten, enjoying the shade of trees and a beautiful view of the castle. It’s a perfect way to spend a hot day.

locationInfo.description: Schlossgarten is one of Münster's most popular parks. Enjoy the fresh air, relax, and eat some snacks while soaking in the beauty of the park and castle.
safetyTips: Bring sunscreen and hats to protect yourself from the sun.
Use a blanket or towels to sit comfortably on the grass.

description: Cool off with a 2-hour swim at the Dortmund-Ems Canal. Relax in the water and enjoy the summer heat with a refreshing dip.

locationInfo.description: The Dortmund-Ems Canal offers a peaceful environment for swimming. It’s a great place to cool down during the summer heat.
safetyTips: Ensure that swimming is allowed at the location.
Stay hydrated and bring water bottles to the spot.

activity: Walking Tour through the Botanical Garden
description: Take a 2-hour walking tour of the Botanical Garden, enjoying the lush green space and cooling off under the shade of trees in the hot weather.

locationInfo.description: The Botanical Garden offers a peaceful and shaded environment to walk around. The variety of plants provides a cooling experience in the warm weather.
safetyTips: Stay hydrated and take rest breaks when needed.
